content.question: How does the rate of work done by Earth on by Student <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math>, <math alttext="P sub X" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, compare to the rate of work done by Earth on by Student <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math>, <math alttext="P sub Y" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>, as the students run up the hill?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub X equals one half P sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="P sub X equals P sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub X equals 2 P sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub X equals 4 P sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P sub X equals P sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
